_sText:
fy_snow_07 by Dr. Spud
(original fy_snow by Punkki) I know I know, another fy_snow.... but seriously, I tried to make this the definitive version of the map. I wanted to play snow, but found that every other css version was either not the right size, too different, or had some unfortunate problem. So this is my take on the classic - and besides the look, it is totally faithful to the original. The graphics are purposely simple (but not lacking by any means!) to ensure optimal performance with many players on-screen.
Features
  • super-optimized for performance, although still decent looking
  • weapons use the EXACT placing from the original
  • the weapon set is the same as the original
  • the size is as close to the original as possible
  • all weapons spawn with ammo
  • low gravity play works great.
  • snowing effect looks correct
  • there's an overview radar, and a NAV file
  • one difference from the original: there's no body armor. But, AWPers didn't need the armor anyway, and there's no good way to put armor on the ground in css.
All custom content is made by Dr. Spud and may not be re-used.
More by Dr. Spud Check out my bomb/defuse map, de_glacier And for another fight yard map, try out my brand-new map, fy_highrise_09
